channel.title: Dividend Payment on FinanClub

item.title: CRBG
item.description: score:85 Chances: Corebridge Financial, Inc. has reported a solid financial performance for the full year 2023 as well as the fourth quarter, indicating a potential for growth and stability in the coming year. The expansion of Corebridge’s annuity lineup for registered investment advisors (RIAs) with the launch of American Pathway AdvisorySM reflects a strategic move to capture a wider market share and attract new customers.
